line.text: 'Cannot send your personal ship to recycling.'
'A ship with the same template and same job, if any, will be rebuilt after recycling.'
'Reminder: for fleet ships, it is recommended to use the reinforcement feature, available from the Fleet settings menu.'
'Reminder: for Workers, if an Outpost has auto-replace on, the ship is only replaced when killed in action.'

line.comment: * $t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= 'Failures', alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= $col4
* $t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= $failures, alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= $col4

line.text: 'Click a ship to order him to recycle at the specified Outpost, if any.'
'Maintenance cost is increased by maintenance factor if the ship is not equipped with a Mobile Maintenance Kit.'
'Maintenance factor is increased by 1 at each cycle if the ship is undocked.'
'Maintenance is only paid from your main account.'
'Your eager Crusaders require 30% less payment. (Mandalorian Plot Decision)'

sval.val: Cannot send your personal ship to recycling.
A valid Outpost must be set.
A ship with the same template and same job, if any, will be rebuilt after recycling.
Reminder: for fleet ships, it is recommended to use the reinforcement feature, available from the Fleet settings menu.
Reminder: for Workers, if an Outpost has auto-replace on, the ship is only replaced when killed in action.
Click a ship to order him to recycle at the specified Outpost, if any.
Maintenance cost is increased by maintenance factor if the ship is not equipped with a Mobile Maintenance Kit.
Maintenance factor is increased by 1 at each cycle if the ship is undocked.
Maintenance is only paid from your main account.
Your eager Crusaders require 30% less payment. (Mandalorian Plot Decision)
$t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= 'Failures', alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= $col4
$t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= $failures, alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= $col4
